content.en: Pose estimation algorithms: Algorithms are being used to address various research questions in the field of camera pose estimation. These algorithms provide unique and robust solutions for determining the pose of a camera based on different methods, such as linear methods, geometric constraints, and point correspondences. They aim to improve the accuracy, efficiency, and robustness of camera pose estimation, making it possible to achieve real-time and vision-based pose estimation.
content.da: Poseestimeringsalgoritmer: Algoritmer bliver brugt til at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for kameraets poseestimering. Disse algoritmer leverer unikke og robuste løsninger til at bestemme kameraets pose baseret på forskellige metoder, såsom lineære metoder, geometriske begrænsninger og punktkorrespondancer. De sigter mod at forbedre nøjagtigheden, effektiviteten og robustheden af kameraets poseestimering, hvilket gør det muligt at opnå realtids- og visionbaseret poseestimering.
